title: 07/30/2021 - HOUR 2 - Aaron Rodgers, Eric Pincus, Benedict Arnold
itunes:title: 07/30/2021 - HOUR 2 - Aaron Rodgers, Eric Pincus, Benedict Arnold
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--finds some contradictions in Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers' comments from his training camp press conference. Plus, Bleacher Report's Eric Pincus talks with Doug about the dynamics of the Russell Westbrook-Lakers deal. Finally, Doug names his "Benedict Arnold" of college football. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
